altTitles.ja: 惚れ薬が効かない助手

altTitles.en: Assistant Who is Immune to Love Potion

altTitles.ja: カグラバチ

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge.
description.he: צ'יהירו הצעיר מבלה את ימיו באימונים תחת הדרכתו של אביו, מחשל החרבות המפורסם. יום אחד, הוא מקווה להפוך בעצמו ליצרן חרבות דגול. האב המשעשע והבן הרציני--הם חשבו שהימים האלו יימשכו לנצח. אבל לפתע, הטרגדיה מכה. יום אפל ספוג בדם. צ'יהירו וחרבו חיים כעת רק למען הנקמה.
description.ja: 刀匠を志す少年チヒロは、父の下で日々修行に励んでいた。おちゃらけた父と寡黙な息子。笑いの絶えない毎日がいつまでも続くと思っていたが…ある日悲劇が訪れる…。血塗られた絆と帰らない日常。少年は憎しみを焚べ、決意の炎を心に宿す…。
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!
description.pt-br: O jovem Chihiro passa seus dias treinando com seu famoso pai ferreiro. Um dia ele espera se tornar um grande fabricante de espadas. O pai bobo e o filho sério – eles pensavam que esses dias durariam para sempre. Mas de repente, a tragédia acontece. Um dia escuro, encharcado de sangue. Chihiro e sua lâmina agora vivem apenas para vingança. Ação épica de batalha de espadas!

title.en: Onna Tomodachi wa Tanomeba Igaito Yarasete Kureru

altTitles.en: My Female Friends Are Surprisingly Willing to Let Me Do It If I Ask For It

altTitles.ja: 女友達は頼めば意外とヤらせてくれる

altTitles.pt-br: Surpreendentemente, minhas amigas estão dispostas a me deixar fazer isso se eu pedir

description.en: Hisaya Minato, a normal high school student, has a female friend who is a bit peculiar. She is Aoi Hatsuki, the most beautiful girl in the high school. For some reason, they get along very well, and since they happen to live on the same floor, they gradually become good friends, coming and going from each other's houses. One day, Minato suddenly asks her to show him her panties. At first, Hatsuki is reluctant, but then she starts to roll up her skirt?
description.ja:
平凡な高校生・湊寿也には可愛すぎる女友達がいる。それは美少女ギャルの葉月葵。何故か気が合う二人は、偶然同じマンションに住んでいることもあって、お互いの家に入り浸るほど仲良くなっていく。そんなある日、湊は勢いで「パンツを見せてほしい」とお願いしてしまう。初めは渋る葉月だったが、恥じらいつつスカートをめくり始めて――！？
 
--- 
 
Heibon'na kōkōsei Minato hisaya ni wa sukoshi kawatta tomodachi ga ita. Sore wa gakkō ichi no bishōjo Hadzuki Aoi. Nazeka kigaau futari wa, gūzen onaji manshon ni sunde iru koto mo ari, jojoni tagai no ie o yukikisuru nakanoii "tomodachi" ni. Son'na aru Ni~Tsu, minato wa ikioi de "pantsu o misete hoshī" to onegai shite shimau. Hajime wa shiburu hadzukidattaga, mizukara sukāto o mekuri hajimete iki ――!?
description.pt-br: Hisaya Minato, um simples estudante do ensino médio, tem uma amiga um tanto peculiar. Aoi Hatsuki, a garota mais linda do ensino médio, por alguma razão, eles se dão muito bem, e por morarem no mesmo andar, gradualmente se tornaram melhores amigos, indo e vindo da casa um do outro. Um dia, Minato de repente pede que ela mostre sua calcinha para ele. De cara, Hatsuki fica relutante, mas então ela começa a levantar sua saia?

description.en: Gumiho Yeon, who despises humans, accidentally avoids an accident with the help of human Dong-i. In essence, a nine-tailed fox is a being that has to repay the favor it receives. Yeon visits Dong-i without skipping a day for Bo-eun, and Dong-i is only burdened with such a kite. The two, who seemed never to be able to get closer, know each other's wounds and shortcomings, fill them in, and develop good feelings... The two are different in their environment, race, and way of loving. Can a nine-tailed fox and human love have a happy ending?
description.ko:
인간을 멸시하는 구미호 연은 우연히 인간인 동이의 도움을 받아 사고를 면하게 된다.

본디 구미호란 은혜를 입으면 갚아야만 하는 존재.
연은 보은을 위해 하루도 거르지 않고 동이를 찾아가고, 동이는 그런 연이 부담스럽기만 하다.

절대 가까워질 수 없을 것 같던 둘은 서로의 상처와 결핍을 알고, 채워주며 좋은 감정을 키워나가는데...

살아온 환경도, 종족도, 사랑하는 방식마저 다른 둘. 구미호와 인간의 사랑은 과연 행복한 결말로 맺어질 수 있을까?

title.en: Kuma to Usagi wa Tomodachi dewa Irarenai

altTitles.ja: クマとウサギは友達ではいられない

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuma to Usagi wa Tomodachi de wa Irarenai

altTitles.en: Bear and Bunny Cannot Be Friends

altTitles.ja: チャラ男くんと清楚ちゃん

description.en:
A playboy goes after an innocent-seeming girl, having no idea what he's getting into.

**Note:** Not to be confused with [NoTR](https://mangadex.org/title/03346265-8076-4b14-8c80-78c2f04511be), another series from this same artist.

title.en: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

altTitles.ja: 女神のカフェテラス

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
description.ja: 東大現役合格の秀才・粕壁 隼。ケンカ別れしていた祖母の訃報を聞いて、3年ぶりに海辺の町の古びた実家「カフェテラス・ファミリア」に帰ると、そこには見知らぬ５人の女の子が！ しかも彼女たちは「おばあちゃんの家族」を名乗り…!? 運命の女×５との贅沢すぎる共同生活が始まるっ！『涼風』『君町』『風夏』の瀬尾公治が描く一つ屋根の下ハーレム！ どの娘に恋する？どの娘を愛でる？
description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".
description.vi: Kasukabe Hayato đã được nhận vào Đại Học Tokyo ngay trong lần thi đầu tiên. Nhưng sau khi nhận được tin bà nội qua đời, anh trở về ngôi nhà thời thơ ấu của mình, quán cà phê Familia.  Và thấy 5 cô gái lạ mặt tự xưng là "Gia đình của bà"! Cuộc sống mới của Hayato tại một thị trấn ven biển với năm cô gái định mệnh bắt đầu từ đây!

altTitles.ja: うずまき

altTitles.th: ก้นหอยมรณะ

description.en:
On her way to the station to pick up Shuichi Saito, a high school student from a neighboring town, she finds Shuichi's father sitting in an alley, staring at a wall. 

He seemed oblivious to Kirie's greeting and continued to stare at the snail shell stuck to the wall... 

An out-of-this-world horror depicted by Junji Ito, the genius of new-sensation horror!
description.ru: Курозу — маленький японский городок. По словам Сюити Сайто, друга главной героини Кириэ Госимы, этот город проклят спиралями. Они видны повсюду — как в растениях или урагане, так и в людях. Отца Сюити одолевает навязчивая идея, и постепенно каждый житель города погружается в водоворот событий, из которого невозможно вернуться...
description.uk: Курозу – маленьке японське містечко. За словами Шюїчі Сайто, друга головної героїні Кіріе Ґошіми, це місто прокляте спіралями. Вони помітні всюди – як в рослинах або урагані, так і в людях. Батька Шюїчі оволодіває нав'язлива ідея, і поступово кожен житель міста занурюється у вир подій, з якого неможливо повернутися…
description.pt-br: Uzumaki conta a história de uma cidade assombrada, não por um fantasma ou demônio, mas por um padrão geométrico que domina a mente de seus habitantes. Em Kurouzu Cho, uma pequena cidade costeira do Japão, tudo parecia normal até que alguns de seus habitantes começarem a ter comportamentos muito estranhos, ligado a obsessão pela forma espiral. Tudo começa quando kirie Goshima vê o pai de seu namorado hipnotizado por uma casca de caracol e a partir daí, muitos coisas estranhas viriam acontecer.

altTitles.ja: サンダ

description.en:
In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.
description.ja: これは少し未来のお話。超少子化が進み、様々な風習が失われた近未来。大黒愛護学園に通う普通の少年、三田は、なぜか同級生の冬村四織に命を狙われていた。突如として振り下ろされる凶刃。それには、行方不明になった冬村の友人と、三田が抱えている「とある呪い」に理由があって…!?

altTitles.ja: 星空のカラス

description.en: Waka is a 13 year-old Go-lover! Learning from her grandfather, a pro go player, she comes to enjoy connecting with the people around her, regardless of age or gender. One day, she meets the young genius go player, Sagisaka Souji, in a match that tore at both body and soul, and so she decides to become a pro go player herself!

altTitles.ja: かまくらBAKE猫倶楽部

description.en: There exists an old rumor relating to cats within the ancient capital of Kamakura... that if you go to the "Bakeneko Club", located somewhere in Kamakura, you can meet cats that have gone missing. Even today, people wander into "Kamakura Neko Club", where Maya and Gakuto work, relying on this rumor.

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

altTitles.es-la: La persona sentada a mi lado me mira de esa manera
La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.uk: Однокласниця що сидить біля мене, дивиться на мене хтивими очима

altTitles.en: The weirdo one desk over keeps giving me THAT kind of look

altTitles.ur: Sath ki kursi par beithne wali mujhe "Un Ankhoñ" se deikhti he

description.en: Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
description.ja: 主人公の池沢くんは、同じクラスの美少女・江口さんのことを「そういう目」で見ている。しかし実は、江口さんも「そういう目」で池沢くんのことを見ていて！？チラ見えする筋肉、汗ばむ肌、髪の香り…互いに興味津々な2人の「下心」から始まる純愛ラブコメ！好きな人のなら、臭いも汗も×××も…全部好き。

title.en: Blue Archive - Problem Solver 68 Business Diary

altTitles.ja: ブルーアーカイブ 便利屋68業務日誌

altTitles.vi: Blue Archive: Nhật kí nghiệp vụ của Handyman 68

description.en: From the smash hit smartphone game "Blue Archive" comes the debut of Problem Solver 68 as our protagonist in this spin-off comic!! Please enjoy the comedic story of our four Problem Solvers in Kivotos - The Academic City!
description.ja: 大人気スマホゲーム『ブルーアーカイブ』から、「便利屋68」を主役としたスピンオフコミックが登場!! 学園都市キヴォトスを舞台に便利屋の4人が巻き起こすドタバタ劇をお楽しみください！
description.vi: Từ trò chơi dành cho smartphone đang nổi tiếng hiện nay "Blue Archive" chào đón sự xuất hiện dưới tư cách nhân vật chính của câu lạc bộ "Handyman 68 (Công ty Dịch vụ giúp việc số 68)" trong bộ manga ngoại truyện này!! Hãy cùng thưởng thức câu chuyện hài hước của bốn cô gái chạy vặt ở Thành phố Học viện Kivotos nào!

title.en: I Tamed a Tyrant and Ran Away

altTitles.de: Ich zähmte den Tyrannen und rannte weg

altTitles.fr: Fuir le tyran que j'ai crée
J'ai apprivoisé un tyran et me suis enfuie

altTitles.pt: Eu domei um tirano e escapei

altTitles.fa: یک ستمگر رو رام کردم و بعدش فرار کردم

altTitles.ja: 暴君を手懐けて逃げてしまった

altTitles.zh-hk: 我在馴服暴君後落跑了

altTitles.th: ฉันลวงทรราชให้ภักดีแล้วหนีจาก

altTitles.vi: Thuần Hóa Bạo Chúa Rồi Bỏ Trốn

description.en:
God gave me a chance to relive my life. Before my rebirth, I'd been used for the past 400 years as the empire's sword. And so, I swore to destroy the empire. I found the young prince of the country and became his teacher. I taught him how to become a tyrant and asked for the country.

"I will do as the lady wishes."

He conquered the whole empire for me, and I ran away.

"I came to take you, Charlize Ronan," Dylan had become a perfect tyrant and searched the entire empire for me.

"You tamed me, so why did you run away?"

---
All Charlize Ronan ever wanted was to bring honor to her family. But instead, she is forced into becoming a “living sword” -- a mere tool for the emperors. It is from this hell that she prays for justice… and awakens in her former body. Now, determined to tear down this horrible empire, Charlize seeks out the young prince, Dylan Blade. She will put him on the throne, not as an honorable ruler, but as a tyrant. It is time for Charlize to tame the one who will bring forth her revenge.

---

description.es:
Dios me dio la oportunidad de revivir mi vida. Antes de mi renacimiento, me habían utilizado durante los últimos 400 años como espada del imperio. Y así, juré destruir el imperio. Encontré al joven príncipe del país y me convertí en su maestra. Le enseñé a convertirse en un tirano y le pregunté por el país.

"Haré lo que la dama desee."

Conquistó todo el imperio para mí y me escapé.

"Vine a llevarte, Charlize Ronan." Dylan se había convertido en un perfecto tirano y me buscó por todo el imperio.

"Me domaste, así que ¿por qué te escapaste?"

---

description.ru:
Бог дал мне еще один шанс и наконец я вернулась спустя четыреста лет. Как только я поняла, что вернулась, я решила, что «Никто не должен быть охвачен гордыней». Моей целью было уничтожить страну. Итак, я выросла с гениальным принцем, который жил в подполье и ожидал возможности для возвращения. Он захватил Империю для меня, и я оставила его, чтобы он достиг своей цели.
— Я пришел, чтобы забрать тебя, Шарлиз Ронан.
Через несколько лет поисков по всему континенту Дилан, ставший идеальным тираном, нашел меня.
— Почему ты сбежала?!

---

description.uk:
Кейра – меч імператорів, що несе славу та розквіт Імперії Блейд. Ніхто й подумати не може, що колись цей меч був людиною. 
Шарліз Ронан лише хотіла стати честю своєї сім'ї. Погодившись стати імперським лицарем, вона не знала, на які страждання себе прирекла. Хоч її тіло перетворили на меч, та розум завжди був у свідомості. З самого пекла вона молилася про справедливість.

«Я не проклятий меч! Я – людина!»

Їй дали другий шанс. Шанс на помсту. Шарліз рішуче вирішила знищити Імперію Блейд. Вона посадить на трон Ділана, тринадцятого принца, не як почесного правителя, а як жорсткого тирана. Вона зруйнує імперію навіть ціною власного життя.

«Шарліз, чому ти спочатку підкорила мене, а потім залишила?»

altTitles.ja: グッド・ドクター

description.en:
The main character, Park Si-on, suffers from autism and savant syndrome.
With his innate genius like two sides of the same coin, he enters a pediatric surgery resident at a university hospital.
The prejudice of being a doctor with autism and the battle for power in the hospital are getting more and more dangerous...!
Will I ever be able to become a real doctor?

---

- Based on 2013 K-drama of the same name
description.ko:
몸은 29살, 마음은 9살. 자폐증과 서번트 증후군을 앓고 있는 주인공 박시온.
동전의 양면처럼 타고난 천재성을 가지고 대학병원 소아외과 레지던트로 들어가게 된다.
자폐증을 앓는 의사라는 편견과 병원 안에서 벌어지는 세력 싸움 속에서 점점 위태로워지는데..!
과연 진짜 의사가 될 수 있을까?

description.en: "Prince Flynn of Albion is adored for his charm and good looks-but the endless dating rumors? Not so much. Tired of the gossip, he proposes a bold idea to his secretary, Drew: pretend to date him to control the narrative. It’s all for show…until Drew starts seeing Flynn in a different light. Can a staged romance turn into something real?"

altTitles.en: Don't Mess With the Film Club!

altTitles.ja: 映像研には手を出すな！

altTitles.ja-ro: Eizouken ni wa Te o Dasu na!
Eizouken ni ha Te wo Dasu na!

description.en:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!
___
**Additional Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Anime Twitter](https://twitter.com/Eizouken_anime)
- [Official Anime Website](http://eizouken-anime.com/)
- [Official Live-Action Website](https://eizouken-saikyo.com/)

This is a test that puts your life at stake. Pass the test and survive. When the two-faced examiner Qin Jiu meets the cold examinee You Huo, the two amnesiacs are put head to head in a fight by the inhumane system. However, they form a tactic agreement. The system collapses after a series of warnings and the erased memories gradually become clearer. It turns out that at the end of this smoke-filled world, you are still the first person I met. The world is brilliant and grand. Welcome home.

title.en: Tensei Shitara Sainou ga Atta Ken ~Isekai Itte mo Doryoku Suru~

altTitles.ja: 転生したら才能があった件～異世界行っても努力する～

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated With Talent: I'll Work Hard Even If I Go to Another World

description.en:
In a twist of fate, a diligent ronin student finds himself transported to an unfamiliar realm. This unexpected journey began when he valiantly attempted to stop a robbery alongside a female store clerk. Longing for a unique ability that he could hone through hard work, he sought the blessings of a deity. Consequently, he was endowed with two rare talents: "Innate Talent," allowing him to consistently surpass others, and "Clairvoyance," which grants him the insight to assess both individuals and objects. Yet, there's a catch; he requires thrice the standard experience to ascend in levels.

Reborn as Mars, the second son of a noble viscount lineage, he remains committed to refining his abilities. However, the town's periphery shows alarming indications of an imminent monster incursion. Thus, Mars' extraordinary journey of reincarnation in this fantastical world commences.
description.ja: いくら努力しても報われない浪人生は、コンビニの女性店員とともに強盗を捕縛しようとした瞬間、異世界に転生することになってしまった。神様に“努力をしたらしただけ恵まれる才能”を望むんだところ、レベルアップに人より3倍の経験値が必要だが、確実に人より成長できる【天賦】と他者や物を鑑定できる【天眼】のスキルをもらうことになった。準男爵家の次男・マルスとして転生し、努力を重ねてステータスを伸ばしていたが、街の近くで魔物が溢れるスタンピードの前兆が見られて……。異世界転生努力ファンタジー、ここに開幕！

altTitles.ja: Ueki no Housoku
うえきの法則

description.en:
A group of powerful beings called tenkaijin are holding a special tournament. The rules of the game–each tenkaijin selects a kid in junior high to be his champion and grants him a special power. The kids take each other on in heated battle, but if they hurt innocent bystanders, then they lose one of their natural-given abilities. Every time they win a battle, they gain a new ability. The ultimate winner of the tournament is granted any power of his choosing, and the tenkajin who he represents succeeds in becoming the next god. Kosuke Ueki has been chosen to fight in the tournament. His special power–the ability to turn garbage into trees.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **The Law of Ueki** (2006)

altTitles.vi: Rockman - Chiến binh thế giới ảo

altTitles.ja: ロックマンエグゼ

description.en: The year is 200X, an age where everything is covered with computer networks, and everyone in the world has a "PET" mobile terminal. Hikari Netto, a grade school student at Akihara Elementary, is in perfect harmony with his NetNavi, Rockman, and is obsessed with Net Battles. But then, he gets caught up in an incident involving World Three (WWW), a criminal organization that stages cyber-terrorist attacks. Finally, the Ministry of Science is taken over, and Netto's father is taken hostage. In order to save his father and stop WWW's plan, he confronts the Dream Virus, the most powerful computer virus fused with the "Ultimate Program."

title.en: Houkago, Family Restaurant de, Class no Ano Ko to

altTitles.vi: Sau giờ học, tại nhà hàng gia đình, cùng cô bạn cùng lớp

altTitles.ja: 放課後、ファミレスで、クラスのあの子と。

altTitles.en: After School, at a Family Restaurant at Night, With That Girl From My Class

altTitles.pt-br: Depois da escola, em um restaurante familiar à noite, com aquela garota da minha turma

altTitles.id: Setelah Sekolah, di Restoran Keluarga Malam Hari, Bersama Cewek Teman Sekelasku

description.en:
It's kind of fun, and I'm comfortable with that kind of time.

The family restaurant after school is the only place where I can feel at ease, as I have no place at home due to my parents' remarriage.
At the family restaurant, I meet a classmate, Kazemiya Kohaku, who is a solitary beautiful girl who doesn't fit in with anyone.
She also seems to be having problems with her family.

From that day on, the boring time at the family restaurant became an enjoyable time to complain with Kohaku.
At the family restaurant after school, the two of them begin their search for a reason not to return home again today...
description.ja:
なんとなく楽しい、そんな時間が心地よくて。

放課後のファミレス、そこは親の再婚で家に居場所がない俺にとって、唯一気が休まる大切な居場所。
そんなファミレスで出会ったクラスメイトの加瀬宮小白は、誰とも馴染まない孤高の美少女。
聞けば彼女も家族との問題を抱えているらしい。

その日から、退屈だったファミレスでの時間は小白と愚痴り合う楽しい時間になった。
放課後のファミレスで、今日もふたりの帰らない理…
description.pt-br: É divertido e me sinto confortável com esse tipo de tempo. O restaurante familiar depois da escola é o único lugar onde posso me sentir à vontade, pois não tenho lugar em casa devido ao novo casamento dos meus pais. No restaurante da família, conheço uma colega de classe, Kazemiya Kohaku, que é uma linda garota solitária que não se dá bem com ninguém. Ela também parece estar tendo problemas com sua família. Daquele dia em diante, o tempo chato no restaurante da família tornou-se um momento agradável para reclamar com Kohaku. No restaurante da família, depois da escola, os dois começam a procurar um motivo para não voltarem para casa hoje...

altTitles.ja: ふたり生徒会

description.en:
What do you do when your student council doesn't have enough members to fill all the positions? Well, take most of them on your own, of course!  
  
Seishirou Watari is a middle school student and has the roles of student council president / secretary / treasurer / general affairs officer, and he's accompanied by Ryouko Mizutani, his vice president. Together they, well… make do with whatever little they have. What do you want? It's only the two of them, okay!?

title.en: Josou shite Off-Kai ni Sanka shite mita.

altTitles.en: I (♂) Cross-Dressed for the IRL (♀) Meetup

altTitles.ja: 女装してオフ会に参加してみた。

description.en: “Cocoa" has made three best friends in her monthly meetup group, where girls get together every month by meeting up at the cutest and trendiest new dessert cafes. Cocoa is in it for the sweets—really!—but she's also harboring a few secrets: Not only does Cocoa have a crush on another one of the girls in the group, Opera, but she's actually a guy named Satoshi who's been cross-dressing! During one meetup, things come to a head when Opera discovers that Cocoa is cross-dressing—and to Cocoa's surprise, Opera confesses that she is too! [Kodansha]

title.en: Gunjin Shoujo, Seiritsu Mahou Gakuen ni Senyuu Suru Koto ni Narimashita

altTitles.en: The Female Soldier Has Been Told to Infiltrate an Imperial Magic Academy

altTitles.ja: 軍人少女、皇立魔法学園に潜入することになりました。～乙女ゲーム？ そんなの聞いてませんけど？～

description.en:
Razé was a cheat soldier at the age of 15, thanks to the memories of her previous life. One day, she was summoned by her superior – the devil Prime Minister and was ordered to go on a long-term solo mission. She was expecting a harsh mission, but…

“I knew you are the right person for this, Lieutenant Colonel Razé Orphan. I want you to attend the Centrior Imperial Magic Academy starting from this spring.”

“…..what?”

Well, it seems that she has been appointed as the “bodyguard” for the prince and other noble’s kids. And so, she was enrolled to the school where the aristocratic-sama gathered.

Although she was puzzled by the glittering school life, she was trying to live a life so as not to be bullied in the future. But it seems there was a secret that she didn’t know hidden in this world.

“Hey!!!!!! No one told me that this is an otome game!!!!!”

As a bodyguard, her life would be over if any of the noble kids got hurt. But then a young lady who claimed to be the ill-fated villainess came by. If the girl died, won’t she be dead too?

Today, Razé will continue to watch over her school life (with her own life on the line).

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime

altTitles.fr: Moi, quand je me réincarne en Slime

altTitles.en: In Regards to My Reincarnation as a Slime

altTitles.th: เกิดใหม่ทั้งทีก็เป็นสไลม์ไปซะแล้ว

altTitles.zh-hk: 关于我转生后成为史莱姆的那件事

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件

altTitles.es-la: Aquella vez que me convertí en Slime

altTitles.ar: ذلك الوقت الذي تجسدت فيه كسلايم

altTitles.tr: O zaman bir balçık olarak reenkarne oldum
O zaman bir slime olarak reenkarne oldum

altTitles.de: Meine Wiedergeburt als Schleim in einer anderen Welt

description.en:
The ordinary Mikami Satoru found himself dying after being stabbed by a slasher. It should have been the end of his meager 37 years, but he found himself deaf and blind after hearing a mysterious voice.  
He had been reincarnated into a slime!  
  
While complaining about becoming the weak but famous slime and enjoying the life of a slime at the same time, Mikami Satoru met with the Catastrophe-level monster “Storm Dragon Veldora”, and his fate began to move.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10044/episode/317350) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/233-that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/587), [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/comic/618e32db10673)
description.ru:
37-летний японец-холостяк был зарезан на улице каким-то мерзавцем-грабителем. Тут бы и истории конец, да всё обернулось иначе, неожиданно он переродился слизью в фэнтезийном мире. Но что может сделать, пускай и разумная, но слизь?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20736)
description.es-la: Un hombre, que al tratar de salvar a su compañero de trabajo y su novia, fue apuñalado por un ladrón que escapaba. Mientras moría desangrado escuchó una voz extraña. Esta voz escuchó su lamento de haber muerto virgen y a causa de eso le dio la Habilidad Única "Gran Sabio" ¿Fue esto una burla? Ahora él ha reencarnado como un Slime en otro mundo, ¿Será este el inicio de una emocionante aventura?
description.pt-br: Depois de ser morto por um ladrão que fugia, um rapaz normal de 37 anos de idade se encontra reencarnado em um outro mundo como um slime cego com habilidades únicas. Com um novo nome "Rimuru Tempest" ele chegou depois de conhecer seu novo amigo, o "nível catástrofe", Dragão da Tempestade Verudora, ele começa sua vida de slime em outro mundo com seu crescente número de seguidores.

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Soushi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

altTitles.ja: ヘルドッグス 地獄の犬たち

description.en:
Can I kill a person as a police officer!? It's been three and a half years since I became a yakuza, and the infiltration never ends.  
  
Kanetaka of the Higashi-Sheath Association is a gangster with a strong arm who has climbed up to assistant young head.  
He landed in Okinawa at the command of the organization and killed his target, Kino.  
That night, Kanetaka vomits violently.  
He was an undercover investigator at the Metropolitan Police Department!  
What is the purpose of Kanetaka's actions!?

altTitles.ja: 冒険者ギルドの万能アドバイザー

description.en: Red is an ex-adventurer who was once the driving force in managing his party. He took care of all the busywork, such as dealing with guild requests and supplies for their adventures. Eventually, the hero declared that he was useless in battle and forcefully expelled him from the party. Having everything taken away from him, he spent his time frequenting a guild's tavern. Eventually, a young adventurer who was in trouble was saved by Red, and she begged him to take her on as an apprentice. As time went on, he realized that he had potential in training adventurers. He decided that his true calling was to be a teacher! This is a story about a jack of all trades instructor and his versatile students that will eventually become legendary adventurers who will take down the Demon King.

title.en: Touhou Suichouka ~ Lotus Eater-tachi no Suisei

altTitles.en: The Lotus Eaters, Drunk and Sober
Touhou Drunken Butterfly Flower ~ Lotus Eaters' Sobering

altTitles.ja: 東方酔蝶華　ロータスイーター達の酔醒

altTitles.pt-br: Touhou: Flor de Borboleta Bêbada ~ Comedores de Lotus, Bêbados e Sóbrios
Flor de Borboleta Bêbada Oriental ~ Os Bêbados e Sóbrios Comedores de Lotus

description.en: In this sixth official Touhou manga series from ZUN, the shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei goes to investigate a strange rumor in the human village, where she gets involved with the local Geidontei bar and its poster girl, Miyoi Okunoda.
description.ja: 幻想郷の人里にある居酒屋「鯢呑亭（げいどんてい）」には、最近、飲んだ帰りの客が妖怪にさらわれて失踪するという噂が。博麗神社の巫女・霊夢はこの疑惑の調査に乗り出す。どうやらカギは看板娘の美宵のようで…？
description.es-la:
En la aldea humana de Gensokyo, un rumor sobre un youkai que supuestamente secuestra a personas alcoholizadas se extiende de forma repentina con gran rapidez, causando miedo y preocupación entre la gente. Mientras tanto, en el centro de este rumor, el bar izakaya Geidontei, no hay nada fuera de lugar en lo que respecta a su comida y bebida, o incluso con respecto a su propietario.

Cuando la sacerdotisa Reimu Hakurei se entera de la situación, intenta cumplir con su deber de investigar el sospechoso establecimiento. Sin embargo, el caso la lleva a otra persona: Miyoi Okunoda, cuya existencia parece ser tan volátil como una burbuja.
description.pt-br:
Uma estranha história sobre álcool. O mais novo mangá oficial de "Touhou", escrito por ZUN.   
  
Existe um rumor de que em um bar chamado "Geidontei", localizado em uma área remota de Gensokyo, um cliente bêbado foi sequestrado por um youkai. Reimu, sacerdotisa do Santuário Hakurei, embarca em uma investigação, mas aparentemente, a chave para desvendar o caso está na garçonete da loja…?

description.en:
Sunghoon was a normal high schooler until one day, he finds out he is engaged to a tiger from Korean mythology. It is foretold that the world will end unless Sunghoon marries the tiger. This story begins with the cute smile of the tiger girl.  
  
*Notice: This series reads like a manga, from right-to-left.*

Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)
description.pt-br: Bai Lijin, uma fada que vivia no céu, comendo e bebendo sem se preocupar, quebrou o colorido vitral de Sua Majestade em seu aniversário e foi banida para o reino mortal. Agora ela tem que começar suas aventuras no reino mortal sem todos os seus poderes espirituais! Para sobreviver, a ex-fada tem que entregar comida… Uma fada carinhosamente boba, uma gentil gerente de restaurante, uma aluna reservada e uma garota de duas caras difícil de resistir, que comece a história de sua bela amizade e juventude!

description.de:
Von klein auf lebte Artezia Rosan in dem Glauben, sie könne ein glückliches Leben führen, solange ihr Bruder erfolgreich ist. Als Meisterin der Manipulation und Intrigen wurde sie das wichtigste Hilfsmittel ihres Bruders, um den Thron des Imperiums zu erobern. Genau deshalb traf sie der Verrat ihres Bruders so hart, als sie für ihre Taten gefesselt und gefoltert wurde. Nachdem sie von Großherzog Cedric Ebron gerettet wird, nutzt sie eine verbotene Magie und opfert ihr eigenes Leben, um ihm zu helfen, dem grausamen Kaiser ein Ende zu setzen. Die Ereignisse nehmen eine seltsame Wendung, als sie einige Jahre in der Vergangenheit aufwacht und schwört, Großherzog Cedric um jeden Preis zu helfen, selbst wenn dies bedeutet, ihre eigene Familie aufzugeben. Man sagt, Blut ist dicker als Wasser, aber kann Artezia es schaffen, ihren Bruder zu besiegen, während ihre eigene Romanze inmitten des Chaos erblüht?

---
* [Official Translation (DE)](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-villainess-lives-again-de)
description.en: From childhood, Artezia Rosan's happiness was dependent on ensuring the success of her brother. As a master manipulator and schemer, she became his most valuable ally in seizing the empire’s throne. That’s exactly why her brother's betrayal cut so deeply when Artezia was imprisoned as punishment for all of her crimes. Soon after being rescued by Grand Duke Cedric Ebron, she vows to help him overthrow the cruel new emperor by sacrificing her own life with forbidden magic. Now waking up several years earlier back in time, she will forsake her own family to help Cedric at all costs. They say that blood is thicker than water, but can Artezia destroy her brother while her own romance blossoms amidst the chaos?
description.fr:
Depuis son plus jeune âge, Artezia vit dans l’ombre de son frère, dont le succès suffirait à garantir le bonheur et la sécurité de la famille, selon sa mère. Elle devient donc la meilleure alliée de ce dernier, organisant maintes conspirations afin de l’aider à accéder au trône impérial. C’est pourquoi, quand ce but est finalement atteint mais qu’elle se retrouve trahie, mutilée et enchaînée en punition pour ses crimes, son ressentiment n’en est que plus grand. Sauvée par le Grand Duc Cedric Ebron, elle décide alors d’utiliser la magie pour aider ce dernier à détrôner l’empereur cruel qu’est devenu son frère. Un sort magique lui permet de revenir plusieurs années en arrière et de changer le cours des choses… Mais Artezia parviendra-t-elle à changer le destin, alors que l’amour s'immisce au milieu du chaos?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/villainess-lives-again-fr)
description.ja:
謀略の天才、皇帝を作り上げる！ ”お兄様が成功すれば、お前も成功するのよ” それを信じ、あらゆる悪事を企てた悪女「アルティゼア」。 しかし、彼女の兄への忠誠は裏切りとして返ってくる。 死を前にした彼女に手を差し伸べたのは宿敵であり、正義ある大公「セドリック」だけだった。 魔術で命と引き換えに18歳の自分に生まれ変わった彼女は、「セドリック」を皇帝にするために新たな人生を捧げることにするがーー

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/50796)
description.ko:
모략의 천재, 황제를 만들다!

"오빠가 잘되어야 너도 잘되는 거야."

온갖 악행을 저질러 오빠를 황제로 만들었다.
하지만 아르티제아의 헌신은 배신으로 돌아왔다.
죽음의 문턱에서 그녀에게 구원의 손을 내민 것은, 정의로운 숙적 세드릭 대공뿐이었다.

“계책을 내라.”
“…….”
“이 상황을 뒤집을 수 있는 인물을 나는 그대 외에는 떠올리지 못하겠어. 로산 후작.”
“…….”
“나에게는 그대의 힘이 필요하다.”

이미 기울어진 세력 판도를 뒤집고 도탄에 빠진 제국을 구할 계책은 없다.
그러나 방법은 있다.
모든 것이 잘못되기 이전으로 시간을 돌리는 것.

피의 눈물과 함께 그녀는 자신의 몸을 바쳐 고대마법으로 시간을 돌린다.
이번에는, 실패하지 않으리라.

죽지 않고 18세로 회귀한 아르티제아는 세드릭 대공을 위한 악녀가 될 것을 결심한다.

“저에게 청혼해 주십시오. 당신을 황제로 만들어 드리겠습니다.”

악마에게 무릎을 꿇은 대가로,
당신은 당신 대신 손을 더럽힐 악마를 얻을 것입니다.
description.pt: Ao cometer todo tipo de atos malignos, ela fez do irmão o imperador. Mas sua dedicação foi recompensada com traição. À beira da morte, quem estendeu uma ajuda foi seu arqui-inimigo, o justo Grão-Duque Cedric.Não era possível restaurar o equilíbrio de poder para um império que já estava caindo em ruínas, mas havia uma maneira... de voltar no tempo antes que tudo desse errado. Com seu sangue e lágrimas, ela sacrifica seu próprio corpo para lançar magia antiga, a fim de voltar no tempo. Desta vez, ela não iria falhar.
description.ru:
«Твой старший брат хорош, и ты должна соответствовать.»
Она совершила множество злoдеяний, чтoбы сделать своего старшего брата Императором. Однако преданность Артезии обернулась против неё, ведь единственным, кто подал ей руку помощи на пороге смерти, был заклятый враг, эрцгерцог Седрик.
«Уловки прочь.»
«Я не знаю никого, кроме вас, кто мог бы обратить эту ситуацию вспять. Маркиза Розанна.»
«Мне нужна ваша сила.»
Казалось, тогда уже невозможно было спасти Империю, находившуюся в крайне бедственном положении, и предотвратить падение власти. Но всё же был один способ. Повернуть время вспять прежде, чем все пойдёт не так. Она, с кровавыми слезами на глазах, пожертвовала своим телом, чтобы овладеть древней магией и обернуть время вспять. В этот раз она не подведёт. Вернувшись в возраст восемнадцати лет, Артезия принимает решение не покорно умереть, а стать злодейкой и пойти на службу к эрцгерцогу Седрику.
«Пожалуйста, сделайте мне предложение. И я сделаю вас Императором.»
Дабы демoн пал ниц, нужнo запoлучить другoгo, что испачкает руки вместо вас.

前世为助哥哥成王做尽坏事，却反遭灭口…这一世甘为恶女，联手曾经的政治宿敌，夺回操控人生的王座！

description.en: In 1912, a young woman tracks down the elderly Nagakura Shinpachi, determined to hear the true story of the Demon of the Shinsengumi, the Vice Commander Hijikata Toshizou. Hijikata's story begins in 1859, when he is a violent young man that is honing his sword skills while peddling his family's medicine. Soon, in his quest to find stronger people to fight, Hijikata starts to come into contact with others who will eventually become his comrades in the Shinsengumi. The first one to make an impression on the brash young man is Kondo Isami, who proves to be a better fighter than Hijikata.
description.pt-br: Em 1912, uma jovem mulher rastreia o idoso Nagakura Shinpachi, determinada a ouvir a verdadeira história do Demônio do Shinsengumi, o Vice-Comandante Hijikata Toshizou. A história de Hijikata começa em 1859, quando ele é um jovem violento que está aprimorando suas habilidades com a espada enquanto vende os remédios de sua família. Logo, em sua busca para encontrar pessoas mais fortes para lutar, Hijikata começa a entrar em contato com outros que eventualmente se tornarão seus companheiros no Shinsengumi. O primeiro a causar uma impressão no jovem impetuoso é Kondo Isami, que prova ser um lutador melhor do que Hijikata.

title.en: Bouken ni wa, Buki ga Hitsuyou da! ~Kodawari Rudy no Kajiya Gurashi~

description.en: A young girl Rudy may dream of becoming the greatest weaponsmith in the world, but right now she's just an apprentice at a hardware store. She can't help getting scolded by her master for crafting the craziest weapons! In this dungeon-city where heroes dare to delve, experience the everyday life of the regular folk that keep things running smoothly! Welcome to your "Craft Fantasy!"
description.ja: 迷宮前町の金物屋で働く見習いの少女・ルディは親方に怒られながらも奇想天外な武器を作って、世界一の鍛冶職人を目指して奮闘中。 迷宮の外側の街で冒険を支える普通の人々の日常を描くクラフト・ファンタジー！
description.pt-br: Uma jovem chamada Rudy pode sonhar em se tornar a melhor armeira do mundo, mas, no momento, ela é apenas uma aprendiz em uma loja de ferramentas. Ela não consegue evitar levar broncas de seu mestre por criar as armas mais malucas! Nesta cidade-dungeon onde heróis se aventuram, vivencie o dia a dia das pessoas comuns que mantêm tudo funcionando perfeitamente! Bem-vindo ao seu "Craft Fantasy!"

altTitles.ja: 霧尾ファンクラブ

description.en: Aimi Miyoshi and Nami Sometani are two high school girls who often find themselves talking about a boy in their class, Kirio. This lighthearted romantic comedy follows the daily lives of these two friends and rivals on a journey that, for now, seems to be heading everywhere but love.
description.ja:
女子高生・三好藍美（みよしあいみ）と染谷波（そめたになみ）。二人の間で話題にのぼるのは、いつだって同じクラスの「霧尾（きりお）くん」のこと。
友人でありライバルでもある二人の日常を描く、ラブまではまだたどり着けそうにない一方通行ラブコメディー。

altTitles.ja: きみは四葉のクローバー

altTitles.en: You are a Four Leaf Clover

description.en: Uichi was once popular, but now he is being bullied excessively. Then suddenly, his first love, Yotsuha, appears in front of him. What is this cute and brave girl's purpose...?
description.ja: かつての人気者で、今は過激ないじめを受ける宇一。そんな彼の前に突然現れた初恋の相手・よつは。可愛く健気な彼女の目的とは一体…!?
description.vi: Câu chuyện romcom nhẹ nhàng về hành trình chữa lành trái tim đã tan vỡ của main
description.zh: 某天，曾很有人气的宇一的生活陡然一变。 以往光芒四射的日子被用抹布也无法擦去的黑暗所笼罩。 这时，熟悉宇一过去的初恋—— 四叶突然出现在了他的面前。 她的目的究竟是…！？

title.en: TenPuru -No One Can Live on Loneliness-

altTitles.ja: てんぷる

altTitles.de: TenPuru: Von Einsamkeit kann man nicht leben

description.en: That's right, I'll become a monk! Not knowing what to do with his worldly desires, Akagami Akemitsu aims to live a stoic life. However, the thick karmic blood flowing in him will not permit it!
description.es: Así es, me volveré un monje! Al no saber qué hacer con sus deseos mundanos, Akagami Akemitsu aspira a llevar una vida estoica. Sin embargo, la espesa corriente de energía del karma que fluye en él no lo permitirá.
description.es-la: "É isso mesmo, eu vou me tornar um monge!". Sem saber o que fazer com seus desejos mundanos, Akagami Akemitsu decide viver uma vida estóica. No entanto, o sangue cármico espesso que flui nele não permitirá!

altTitles.ja: 好き×透き

description.en:
Touka Aizuki is a girl who can turn invisible, and no one can see her except for one person, Ryoutarou Mimori.  
  
Even though she is physically invisible, her love is completely visible!
description.ru: || Тока Аидзуки — девушка, которая может становиться невидимой для всех, кроме Рётаро Мимори. Может она сама и невидима, но любовь её отчетливо видна!||

altTitles.ja-ro: うちのメイドがウザすぎる！

altTitles.en: UzaMaid: Our Maid Is Way Too Annoying!

description.en:
Former Air Force Master Sergeant Kamoi Tsubame tries changing careers to finally get cute girls to wear her cute self-designed clothes. To that end she tries to get a job in the Takanashi household as a maid and babysitter to Yasuhiro Takanashi's spoiled daughter Misha Takanashi, as it seems that her mother is no longer present.  
  
Misha has successfully gotten rid of previous maids through playing devastating pranks like throwing mud, laying out banana peels to slip on and lighting the washed clothes on fire. In face of the newest applicant boasting that she has military experience, Misha even thinks about researching bomb making.
description.ja: 母を亡くし父と二人で暮らす小学生女子・ミーシャ。そんな父子家庭にやってきた新人家政婦は、やたらマッチョな上に三度の飯より幼女が大好きで…！？

シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…
description.pt-br: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada “Shy”...

altTitles.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.ja: 甘神さんちの縁結び

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
description.vi:
Được thực hiện bởi phụ tá của Negi Haruba và được chính tác giả của Gotou-bun khuyến khích xem thử. Từ Oneshot nay đã có series và được đông đảo mọi người đón nhận
Uryuu Kamihate chuyển đến Kyoto và tình cờ sống chung với 3 chị em Miko trong một ngôi đền. Tuy vậy cậu lại là một người không tin vào thần linh mà chỉ tin tưởng bản thân mình, chuyện gì sẽ xảy đến với Uryuu khi xung quanh cậu là 3 chị em vu nữ xinh đẹp đây?
description.es-la: Un chico que había perdido la fe en las Oraciones y los Dioses, de pronto conocerá a 3 hermosas Hermanas que son Doncellas del Templo donde comenzará a vivir, ¿Esto afectará de alguna Manera a nuestro Protagonista? Léelo para descubrirlo.
description.pt-br: Kamihate Uryuu, órfão desde a infância, recebe um convite para ficar no santuário xintoísta local. Tudo o que ele queria era um lugar tranquilo para estudar, para que pudesse realizar seu sonho de entrar para uma faculdade de medicina de ponta, mas depois de chegar lá, ele se depara com três belas irmãs donzelas do santuário... E o sacerdote chefe pede que ele se case com uma delas e assuma o santuário. Uma história de amor e milagres está prestes a se desenrolar!

altTitles.ja: ゴブリンスレイヤー

description.en:
A young priestess has formed her first adventuring party, but almost immediately they find themselves in distress. Luckily for her, the Goblin Slayer chose that place as his next killing grounds–a man who's dedicated his life to the extermination of all goblins, by any means necessary. And when rumors of his feats begin to circulate, there's no telling who might come calling next.  

**NOTE:**   
- There are *currently* no English scanlations of this manga. The chapters on the net are the official YenPress chapters.  
As long as they **(YenPress' chapters)** are in publication they are not allowed on MangaDex.  
  
**Links:**  
- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/GoblinSlayer_GA)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://ga.sbcr.jp/sp/goblin_slayer/)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://www.goblinslayer.jp/)
description.pt: Uma sacerdotisa formou seu primeiro grupo de aventureiros, mas, quase imediatamente se encontram em apuros pelos goblins. E o Goblin Slayer é quem vem ao resgate – um homem que tem dedicado sua vida a exterminação de todos os goblins, através de qualquer meio necessário.
description.ru: Юная жрица вместе со своей командой впервые отправилась на поиски приключений, но они тут же попали в беду. На помощь им приходит Убийца Гоблинов – таинственный мечник, посвятивший свою жизнь уничтожению всех гоблинов любыми средствами. В итоге девушка присоединяется к нему в постоянном походе против всевозможных пород гоблинов, в котором сталкивается с новыми тайнами, врагами, друзьями, а иногда и конкурентками.
description.vi: Một nữ tu sĩ trẻ đã thành lập nhóm phiêu lưu đầu tiên của mình, nhưng gần như ngay lập tức họ thấy mình đang đau khổ. Đó là Goblin Slayer đến giải cứu — một người đã cống hiến cuộc sống của mình cho việc tiêu diệt tất cả những yêu tinh, bằng mọi cách cần thiết. Và khi những tin đồn về những kỳ công của anh ấy bắt đầu lan truyền, thì không ai nói được ai có thể gọi tới...
description.pt-br: Um homem deseja tornar-se um “aventureiro”, cujo lema é: “Eu não vou salvar o mundo, eu apenas vou matar goblins.” Após ouvir rumores sobre ele, uma elfa se aproxima dele com um pedido.

altTitles.ja: ゴブリンスレイヤー外伝：イヤーワン

altTitles.zh-hk: 哥布林殺手外傳：第一年

Dũng Sĩ Diệt Yêu Tinh: Năm Thứ Nhất

description.en: A prequel series revealing Goblin Slayer's past and the events that led him to become an adventurer with the sole purpose of exterminating all goblins from the world.
description.pl:
Prequel ujawniający przeszłość Goblin Slayer'a i wydarzenia, które doprowadziły go do zostania poszukiwaczem przygód, któremu przyświeca wyłącznie jeden cel: eksterminacja wszystkich goblinów. ~M

description.pt: Uma série de prequel que revela o passado de Goblin Slayer e os eventos que o levaram a se tornar um aventureiro com o único propósito de exterminar todos os goblins do mundo.
description.ru: События манги перенесут нас на 5 лет назад, в то время, когда Убийца Гоблинов только закончил свои тренировки и расстался с мастером. Манга поведает нам о том, чем занимался Убийца Гоблинов все эти 5 лет до встречи с Жрицей.
description.vi: Tiền truyện tiết lộ quá khứ của Kẻ Diệt Yêu Tinh và những sự kiện đã đưa anh trở thành một nhà thám hiểm với mục tiêu duy nhất là tiêu diệt toàn bộ yêu tinh trên thế giới

description.en:
Tang Ran is a bright and cheerful little fox spirit. To graduate from the Monster Academy, she transforms into a human college student hoping to seduce a human and make them fall in love with her. However, little does she know that the reserved human female professor she has a crush on, Su Qingci, is actually a…

One lie leads to another. To make the other person fall in love with them first, the fox must spin an endless web of “lies.”

altTitles.ja: 二度と自撮り送ってやんない！

altTitles.en: I'll never send a selfie again!

altTitles.ru: Я больше никогда не буду отправлять тебе селфи!

description.en: My childhood friend keeps asking me for a selfie to use as a reference for his drawing, what do I do?
description.ja: 久しぶりに連絡を寄こした幼馴染の影介。漫画の作画資料用にわたしの自撮り写真を送ってほしんだって。成長していろいろ変わった私を見て驚け・・・て、ありがとう以外のこと何か言えないの⁉　恥ずかしいのを我慢して撮っているのに！気になり始めた幼馴染同士の自撮りコミュニケーション・ラブコメ！
description.es-la: Mi amigo de la infancia no deja de pedirme una selfie para usarlo como referencia para su dibujo, ¿Qué hago?

description.en: Yoon Seol-young faces a harsh reality: a cheating boyfriend of three years, a forced blind date with a divorced man ten years her senior, and the burden of financially supporting her suffocating family. Just when she wishes to escape her stifling life, Ki Tae-hwan, the executive director of Shinhwa Group, rumored to be gay due to his excessively clean private life, approaches her with a proposal: "Let's get married. I'll take you to a higher place." Overnight, Seol-young goes from being the secretary in the executive director's office to becoming his daughter-in-law. But what is the true purpose behind Tae-hwan's marriage proposal?
